name: Chatters the Squirrel DEMO
description:
Chatters the Squirrel is a platform game inspired by classic platformers of the 16-bit era like Super Mario World, Yoshi's Island, and Donkey Kong Country.  This demo includes the entire first world of the game, with 10 levels and two boss fights.  There are hillbillies, pirates, secrets, treasure, and lots of 16-bit bluegrass.

Chatters the Squirrel is a one-man project.  All the design, programming, art, and music are being done by just one guy, Reid VanBemmel, aka Plastiware.  If you want to support me and the development of this game, please buy the soundtrack!  If you wanna pay more than the listed 5 bucks for it, I won't complain.  https://plastiware.bandcamp.com/album/chatters-the-squirrel-ost-vol-1

Also check out the official subreddit! https://www.reddit.com/r/chatters/

And the official Discord! https://discord.gg/UFUQXC4
